description:
Join us if you want to know more about the Meteor framework. It is meant for experienced meteorites and total novices.

Program: - 10 min intro about Meteor (really short because there are tons of great intros on youtube)

- 2h45min building your first non-trivial web app

Everyone will give his idea for a doable web app in 2h45min.
I will select 1/2 of them and pair you up (one novice and one more experienced meteorite).
I will walk around the groups and try to get people unstuck on their problems.
Learning by doing is the best way to learn. period.

For the Meteor ninjas:
You know something well only after you have taught it to someone! So come!
name: First meteor meetup in Brussels

description:
Meteor Brussels is back for a second edition!

From the first Meetup I got the feedback that a lot of people would like an intro to

iron-router, blaze, publications and subscriptions, methods, how to make your app secure, structuring your app etcetera.

It will be an overview so that you know the basics of how things work in meteor land.

See you guys soon!

Cheers
how_to_find_us: Take the elevator next to the crazy copy center (building F).
name: Second meteor meetup in Brussels

description:
Come join Meteor Brussels for Worldwide Meteor Day (meteorday.com)! 

The whole Meteor community is holding simultaneous meetups around the world on Nov 6, open to anyone who wants to learn more about the Meteor platform. You’ll meet developers who have built things with Meteor here in Belgium, play with the new Meteor examples and tutorial, and have a Q&A via Hangout with a core developer(s) or expert(s) from the community. We’ll have free Meteor t-shirts and stickers in the new design as well. Be sure to bring your laptops for the deploy-fest and open coworking.


If you’ve built a Meteor app before, we would love to see it during the show & tell part of the meetup. This could be any project large or small, whether that’s a complex production app or just something you threw together on a weekend. Drop us a line in the comments if you have a Meteor app you would like to show. 

*** Last minute Update ***

Bring a friend with you. Our main purpose with this event is to spread the word.

Capgemini, our host, has arranged everything, including catering (sandwiches, soft drinks/water/wine)

If you want to present something, the projector receives input from hdmi and vga. If you have a dvi output please bring and adapter.

Also please remember that there are offerings from Discover Meteor and Manning (http://www.meteorinaction.com), specifically for the event

*** End of Update ***

Schedule:


6:30pm - Doors open. 

Food, drinks, and mingling.

7:00pm - Introduction to Meteor. 

Showcase of new tutorial and example apps.

7:30pm - Deploy fest. 

Chance for everyone to install Meteor and deploy an example app.

7:59pm - Short break. 

Take a group photo, tweet it. :)

8:00pm - Q&A. 

Live Hangout with core devs or experts from the Meteor community.

8:30 - Show & Tell. 

Built an app with Meteor before? We want to see it! Short, informal demos or talks from local developers.

~9pm - Open coworking / socializing. 

Build something cool with what you’ve just learned.
name: Worldwide Meteor Day - Brussels
